statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_id, category FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock = 0
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock AND category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > 10 AND optimal_stock < 50 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Books') ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_food_products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM sustainable_food_products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE product_category = 'Organic';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, product_category, last_updated FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE product_category IN ('Fruits', 'Vegetables');
SELECT * FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE product_category = 'Organic'
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, last_updated FROM sustainable_food_products WHERE quantity < 50 AND unit_price BETWEEN 5.00 AND 10.00
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM sustainable_food_products ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS average_price, MAX(unit_price) AS max_price FROM sustainable_food_products
SELECT * FROM sustainable_products;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM sustainable_products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, supplier_id FROM sustainable_products WHERE inventory_level > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_date, quantity FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_products WHERE inventory_level > 100;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM sustainable_products INNER JOIN suppliers ON sustainable_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY product_id;

SELECT product_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM sustainable_products INNER JOIN suppliers ON sustainable_products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id INNER JOIN transactions ON sustainable_products.product_id = transactions.product_id WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND status = 'delivered';
SELECT product_id, current_stock_quantity AS stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock_quantity < min_stock_quantity;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE stock_quantity < min_stock_quantity;
SELECT * FROM FoodProducts;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM FoodProducts WHERE price > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM FoodProducts ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodProducts ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC, product_name;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM FoodProducts WHERE category='Dairy' ORDER BY category;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
